events.name: TemperatureAlertGenerated
events.description: A new event for when a temperature alert is triggered in the cold chain.

events.name: HumidityAlertGenerated
events.description: Track changes in humidity levels that may affect food storage.

events.name: ColdChainViolationDetected
events.description: Event to indicate any cold chain violations like temperature or humidity breaches.

events.description: Event for when a notification regarding alerts has been successfully sent.

commands.name: SendNotification
commands.description: Event for when a notification regarding alerts has been successfully sent.
